main event: Sighting of a silvery white circular plane that reflected sunlight and vanished without a trace.
interesting points: The object appeared as a thin beam of light before it faded from sight., The sighting lasted approximately 90 seconds., The observer was an experienced pilot and controller., The weather conditions during the sighting were clear with unlimited visibility., Comments from the Director of Intelligence suggested that the object may have been a research balloon or an unusual contrail.
sighted object: circular horizontal plane, silvery white in color
witness description: CAPT S. USAF, OPS OFF, 325TH AIR DIVISION, highly experienced pilot
